sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: Bulman was cursed with a poor memory for names.
sentences.cn: 布尔曼总是记不住人名。

sentences.en: each child was required to recite a verse from memory.
sentences.cn: 每个小孩要背诵一节诗。

sentences.en: He had written the note from memory, word perfect, and spelled atrociously.
sentences.cn: 他凭着记忆作了记录，用词恰当但拼写错误百出。

sentences.en: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.cn: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.en: I shut out the memory which was too painful to dwell on.
sentences.cn: 我不再去回忆那些痛苦不堪的往事了。

sentences.en: I'll repeat that so you can commit it to memory.
sentences.cn: 我会重复一下，好让你们记住。

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with memory and thinking, speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响记忆、思考、语言与协调性。

sentences.en: My memory isn't as good as it once was.
sentences.cn: 我的记性赶不上从前了。

sentences.en: She has a terrible memory for names.
sentences.cn: 她记名字很不行。

sentences.en: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.cn: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

sentences.en: The experience was something he had tried to expunge from his memory.
sentences.cn: 他曾努力将那段经历从记忆中抹去。

sentences.en: The fragments of memory she dredges up do not fit together.
sentences.cn: 她想起的那些支离破碎的片段连不上。

sentences.en: The intervening years had dimmed his memory.
sentences.cn: 经过了其间那么多年他的记忆已经不大清楚了。

sentences.en: The memory of it all was locked deep in my subconscious.
sentences.cn: 关于它的一切记忆都深植于我的潜意识里。

sentences.en: The president will cherish the memory of this visit to Ohio.
sentences.cn: 总统将铭记这次俄亥俄之行。

sentences.en: The skyline of domes and minarets was imprinted on my memory.
sentences.cn: 天空中穹顶与尖塔的轮廓深深刻在了我的记忆中。

sentences.en: Then a memory stirs in you and you start feeling anxious.
sentences.cn: 接着一段回忆涌上心头，你开始感到焦虑不安。

sentences.en: This book is dedicated to the memory of my mother.
sentences.cn: 谨以此书献给我已故的母亲。

sentences.en: When I saw the pictures, the memories came flooding back
sentences.cn: 我见到那些照片时，记忆如潮水般涌来。

words.tran_cn: 纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物

phrases.tran_cn: 计算机内存；计算机存储器

phrases.phrase: take a trip (或 walk) down memory lane

trans.tran_cn: 记忆力，回忆，存储器，怀念
trans.tran_en: someone’s ability to remember things, places, experiences etc
